name: ida-claude-plugins
description: Bundled plugins for Claude Code including IDA Domain scription and IDA Plugin development

plugins.name: ida-plugin
plugins.description: Claude Code Skill for reverse engineering with IDA Pro. Claude autonomously writes and executes IDA Domain scripts to analyze binaries, extract functions, decompile code, and automate any reverse engineering task.
